resources.string: Fades the softkeys to black after not touching it for some time (zst123)
Toggling fading requires SystemUI to be restarted.\n\nRestart SystemUI?
Fading will be enabled the next time SystemUI restarts
Fading will be disabled the next time SystemUI restarts
The time in milliseconds to wait after releasing a softkey before fading
The time taken in milliseconds to fade out
The minimum transparency for the softkeys to fade to
• Created by zst123\n• Inspired by Softkeys Fade Mod in Cataclysm Rom
